skins.shipDescription: Langley-class aicraft carrier ©` Langley, Hull Number CV-1!
skins.selfIntroduction: Ahem! I am the Eagle Union's first, I repeat, the first aircraft carrier, Langley! I do not think highly of my own fighting ability, but I've put out numerous outstanding pilots! The Eagle Union's aircraft carrier begins with me, I say!
skins.acquisition: I've been newly assigned to assist you. Name's Langley. You listening? I am going to fix what's wrong with you, and put you on the right track to running a fleet.
skins.login: Commander, I'll assist you with your work the best I can!
skins.details: Commander, you're staring at me... Are you ready to answer my questions?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander! ~Hey, you could've done better than this. Why are you not serious about this...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: At this rate nothing about the fleet will change! Get yourself together, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander? Are you listening? I'm gonna throw the chalk at you~! I hate people who don't listen to me! Hmph!
skins.secretaryTouch: Please do not treat me like a child~! I am a teacher! TEA-CHER!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: *phone call* Hello, is this the military police? Yes, it's the same place and the same person...

skins.shipDescription: Listen carefully or I'll step on you!
skins.acquisition: Listen to what I say, or I'll have to step on you!
skins.details: Commander, if you run into a mental problem, you have to solve it on your own. Staring at me won't help you.
skins.secretaryIdle1: If we make a little progress each day, we'll be sure to achieve great results one day
skins.secretaryIdle2: This fleet feels different from when I first came. With your hard work, Commander, we can do anything.
skins.secretaryIdle3: We have to punish naughty children. Don't you agree, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: I will answer any question you have for me. However, is that really alright for you, Commander?
